name: PASSION
description:
This short little adventure is about Passion, a warrior of eternal flame, taking back the land taken over by demons of stress and anxiety. Fight your way through three action-packed levels to restore the land to its former glory!

This is a game I made for Meatly Jam 2020 run by TheMeatly on twitter.
(Find him here.)
The theme was "bright tomorrow".

Made using Gamemaker: Studio 2, Aseprite, Bfxr, and love!
